column1: Smoque BBQ////But the BBQ itself? I wasn't overly impressed. I got the brisket - half chopped
column3: and while it was tender and the meat itself had a good flavor
column4: I thought the vinegary BBQ sauce distracted from the flavor. I also thought that it was too fatty for my taste
column5: but that's just me. Mike got the pulled pork
column7: but said he'd had better pulled pork at Kuma's. He might stop by on his way home from work to pick up some BBQ for himself for dinner
column8: but I think I probably won't be back to Smoque
column9: at least not any time soon.
